meanings.sent1: She readorned her room with colorful curtains.
meanings.sent2: The artist readorned the painting with glitter and sequins.
meanings.sent3: The cat readorned the living room with its toys scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The garden was readorned with blooming flowers after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The Christmas tree was readorned with sparkling lights and ornaments.

meanings.definition: To make something more attractive by adding decorative elements.
meanings.sent1: He readorned the cake with icing flowers for the party.
meanings.sent2: The bride readorned her dress with lace and pearls.
meanings.sent3: The children readorned the sandcastle with seashells and seaweed.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were readorned with festive lights for the holiday season.
meanings.sent5: The old house was readorned with fresh paint and a new door knocker.
